articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.title: iPhone 16 display production to start next month: Check expected launch date, specs, more - HT Tech
articles.description: A new leak revealed that Apple may start the display production for iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Pro in June. Know what’s coming.
articles.content: The iPhone 16 series has been in talks for quite some time in the form of specification leaks and rumours. With several images of dummies leaked online, we have an idea about what Apple may introduce… [+1936 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: OpenAI inks deal to train AI on Reddit data - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI has inked a deal with Reddit to train its models on Reddit data. In return, OpenAI will become a Reddit ad partner -- and provide AI-powered tools.
articles.content:
OpenAI has reached a deal with Reddit to use the social news site’s data for training AI models.
In a blog post on OpenAI’s press relations site, the company said that the Reddit partnership will pr… [+3621 chars]

articles.author: Ron Amadeo
articles.title: Google Search adds a “web” filter, because it is no longer focused on web results - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google Search now has an option to search the "web," which is not the default anymore.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Google continues to change what it means to be the "Google" search engine.
146
